name: dlite
author: adamghill
description: A tiny, blazing fast view library that creates reactive Web Components.

scripts.b: npm run build && stat -f%z dist/dlite.es.js | numfmt --to=iec --suffix=B --format='%.2f' && gzip-size ./dist/dlite.es.js
scripts.commit-publish-tag: cross-var git commit -am '$npm_package_version' && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
scripts.publish: npm run t && npm run build && npm run commit-publish-tag && npm publish && npm run size
scripts.test-publish: npm run t && npm run build && npm run commit-publish-tag && npm run size
